attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Deplore the the treatment on returning to the UK of our wounded service personel.The lack of Military hospitals
Trained dedicated staff and the after care sevice. NH hospitals are not the right places.What are you going to do to improve matters?

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a request for action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
